
Convert these binary to desimal
1. 11000101 -> 197
2. 1110101 -> 117
3. 111100011 -> 483
4. 101010100 -> 340
5. 1001101 -> 77
6. 110111110 -> 446
7. 10111101 -> 189
8. 110001000 -> 392
9. 101110100 -> 372
10. 111001 -> 57
1. 276 -> 100010100
2. 190 -> 10111110
3. 62 -> 111110
4. 212 -> 11010100
5. 177 -> 10110001
6. 202 -> 11001010
7. 72 -> 1001000
8. 113 -> 1110001
9. 444 -> 110111100
10. 255 -> 11111111

Add these binary numbers
1. 101111010 + 10101011 =                 1000100101
2. 11011010 + 11000101 =                 110011111
3. 1100000 + 100010 =                 10000010
4. 100000101 + 10001110 =                 110010011
5. 111110100 + 110011 =                 1000100111
6. 111010001 + 110111100 =                 1110001101
7. 11100111 + 110111011 =                 1010100010
8. 110110101 + 1110101 =                 1000101010
9. 11110011 + 100000 =                 100010011
10. 111010110 + 110010 =                 1000001000

Subtract these binary numbers
1. 101011001 - 100010001 =                 1001000
2. 1010110 - 11110 =                 111000
3. 111001100 - 100110000 =                 10011100
4. 110011111 - 1011010 =                 101000101
5. 111001010 - 100010111 =                 10110011
6. 1101011 - 11000 =                 1010011
7. 1001111 - 1000011 =                 1100
8. 110101010 - 101000 =                 110000010
9. 10100100 - 111111 =                 1100101
10. 111010111 - 101110101 =                 1100010

Multiply these binary numbers
1. 100010100 * 101 =                 10101100100
2. 110011001 * 1000 =                 110011001000
3. 111010001 * 1000 =                 111010001000
4. 111011101 * 111 =                 110100001011
5. 111010111 * 111 =                 110011100001
6. 100001 * 110 =                 11000110
7. 110110 * 111 =                 101111010
8. 11010001 * 1000 =                 11010001000
9. 11010100 * 111 =                 10111001100
10. 111011 * 111 =                 110011101

Divide these binary numbers
1. 111100101 / 101 =                 1100001
2. 101101110 / 110 =                 111101
3. 10101001 / 1101 =                 1101
4. 111000000 / 1110 =                 100000
5. 101011111 / 1101 =                 11011
6. 10001010 / 110 =                 10111
7. 1011010 / 101 =                 10010
8. 110001111 / 111 =                 111001
9. 1001110 / 110 =                 1101
10. 100111011 / 1111 =                 10101

Find the ones complement of these binary numbers
1. 110111110 -> 1000001
2. 111010111 -> 101000
3. 11100011 -> 11100
4. 11000 -> 111
5. 11001100 -> 110011
6. 110010100 -> 1101011
7. 1011100 -> 100011
8. 111001011 -> 110100
9. 100001000 -> 11110111
10. 1101110 -> 10001

Find the twos complement of these binary numbers
1. 1001000 -> 111000
2. 101101011 -> 10010101
3. 100110 -> 11010
4. 111100100 -> 11100
5. 11001101 -> 110011
6. 110010010 -> 1101110
7. 100010100 -> 11101100
8. 11011 -> 101
9. 111000001 -> 111111
10. 101001111 -> 10110001

Convert these floating point numbers to binary
1. 191.11745799449045 -> 10111111.0001111000
2. 374.44245770702867 -> 101110110.0111000101
3. 220.92178108647616 -> 11011100.1110101111
4. 473.96780602308274 -> 111011001.1111011111
5. 286.36386961035885 -> 100011110.0101110100
6. 244.62341769078463 -> 11110100.1001111110
7. 318.65015236310694 -> 100111110.1010011001
8. 33.79748446630572 -> 100001.1100110000
9. 228.88643394069643 -> 11100100.1110001011
10. 385.7513004548685 -> 110000001.1100000001
